text: Kɛlɛ poanzai ɠɛni ma: «Gè ɠonaa ɗa-ƓALAGI, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma, nii é vulua, ga ɓulu ɓuɠa ɠila kpalaa ge la zèa pɛlɛi wu. Zee zakpa ɲɛ gila nɔ ɠa é zèa aniɲakai zu ga ɓulu vukɔi, ta gulɔi tago nɔ ɠa é zèa gulɔ woolei zu. Gè ɠɛa ʋaani koʋi ɓuɠa felegɔ yɛʋɛzu, gè li, gè naa mɔta goi ɓɛtɛ dòun zunui ʋɛ. Gá miina, ani ɠili ge la mɔ gi ya, kɛni niina nɔ gi zei, gi ɗa saai maaɓɔun.»
